title: A teacher of merit
author: VD
content_html: Congratulate Spacebunny today. While I never had any doubts that all the time and hard work she was putting into teaching would be well worth it, it’s still encouraging to see external confirmation that homeschooling really does work as well – better, actually – than advertised. It’s one thing to know that the logic behind your family’s educational decision is sound, but to get tangible, external results demonstrating that each year of homeschooling is equivalent to more than two years of collective schooling takes one’s confidence in the concept to an even higher level.
